calculations.name: MTD Value - YoY
calculations.tableau_expression: ([MTD Value] - [MTD Value - Last Year])/[MTD Value - Last Year]

calculation_context.Expression: ([MTD Value] - [MTD Value - Last Year])/[MTD Value - Last Year]

calculated_fields.Measure Selector:
case [Parameters].[Measure Selector Param]
    when 'Profit' then [Profit]
    when 'Sales' then [Sales]
END
